305458.「じゃじゃーん！ 記念すべき \n 第１１回 アストルティア・ナイト\n コンテ:
Ta-dah! I will now announce the results of
the 11th Astoltia Knight Contest!

305459.「さあさあ！ ホワイトショコラ城の\n ナイトの座は 誰の手に！？\n 耳の穴か:
Come, now! Who will be the Knight of the
White Chocolate Castle? Clear your ears and
listen well!

313007.「お集まりの 皆さまぁ～っ！ 記念すべき\n 第１１回 アストルティア・ナイト\:
Laaaadies and gentlemen! Allow me to introduce
the contestants of the 11th Astoltia Knight
Contest!

313008.「前大会で 好成績をおさめ \n 見事 出場権を獲得した ３名に加えて～……:
And now, joining the 3 winners from
last year's tournament...

313009.「ファルパパ神による特別推薦枠 １名と！\n 総勢４８人の予選を勝ち抜いた ４名:
One special recommendation by Falpapa himself, and 4 who made it to the top among 48 preliminary contestants! That makes a total of
8 hotties duking it out!

313010.「まずは 前大会の覇者の 入場だぁっ！\n キュートな ねぼすけくんは 今年も大:
First up, our reigning champion from last
year's competition! Can this suave sleepyhead
once again capture your hearts this year?!

313011.「その たぐいまれな頭脳は 未来だけでなく\n 過去の世界でも フル回転！\n:
That brilliant mind isn't just for the future,
ya know! It does double duty in the past, too!
It's the Prophesied Prognosticator, Pukulas!

313012.「……あれ？ もう コンテストの時間かい？\n せっかく ボクが優勝する夢を 見:
Huh...? It's already time for the contest...?
I was dreaming about being the winner...

313013.「……って 夢じゃなかったぁあああっ！！\n 前回 ボクは 本当に優勝できたんだ:
...i-it wasn't a dream!! I really did win last
time! And it's all thanks to all of you!
Thank you all so much!

313014.「この 幸福な気持ちを キミたちにも\n 分けてあげたい……。今年も ボクのクッ:
I'd like to share my happiness with all of
you, too... I'd be delighted if you could all
eat my cookies again this year!

313015.「続いては 準ナイトの おでましだぁ～っ！！\n ３連覇の経歴を持ち 全ナイトコ:
Next up, we have our almost-Knight! He's got a three-time winning streak and a perfect attendance record to boot! The hottie among
hotties!

313016.「クールな視線に 誰もが釘付け！\n 彼の沼にハマったら もう魚は食べられないっ:
Everyone's enraptured by his cool looks! Once
they suck you in, good luck getting out! The
lone swordsman who comes and goes... Hyuza!

313017.「ここんところ プクリポたちに 立て続けに\n 勝ちを ゆずることになっちまって:
I've been feelin' a bit down lately, seeing
as all these Pukulipos have been winning
left and right...

313018.「アイツらの かわいさの前では\n オレの魅力は かすんじまうのか？:
Do I just stand no chance against their
cuteness or somethin'?

313019.「……いや もう一度 思いださせてやるよ。\n ナイトにふさわしいのが 誰なのか:
Nah, let me go ahead and remind you all
again... Who's worthy of being Knight? The
winner...it's gonna be me, right?

313020.「お次は 主をしのぐ 人気っぷりで\n 前回３位を制した この男～っ！\n 怒涛:
Next up, the man who surpassed even his lord
and claimed third place last time! Once he's
going, there's no stopping him!

313021.「魔王の副官にして 無二の親友！\n その確固たる忠誠心は まさに不朽不滅！\n:
The Demon King's right-hand man and closest
friend, second to none! His unwavering loyalty
never ends! The One-Eyed Wonder... Nazine!

313022.「今年もユシュカと 参加するつもりだったが\n また ひとりになってしまった……:
I was going to participate along with Yushka this year, but it seems I'm alone yet again... You're always trailing behind me... What a
nuisance you are.

313023.「だが こうして 魔界を背負うことに\n なった以上 あいつの分まで 存分に戦い:
But now that I've accepted the responsibility of shouldering the Demon World, I'll fight with all my might, even for his sake. I will
reclaim the title of Knight once again.

313024.「どうか この手をとり 私を選んでほしい。\n ともに 頂点へ のぼりつめよう。:
Please, take my hand and choose me. Let us
climb to the top together. I put my trust in
you...

313025.「続いて ファルパパちゃんによる\n 特別推薦枠 １名を ご紹介だよぉーっ！:
Next, Falpapa will introduce one special
recommendation!

313026.「今回は ななななんと～っ！\n あの超大物が 特別に 降臨しちゃうじぇ～！！:
Next is...w-w-w-what's this?!
That big shot is about to make his special
appearance!

313027.「七柱の種族神の 一番上のお兄ちゃん！\n 頑固で 偉そうだけど 本当はやさしい:
The oldest brother of the seven race gods!
He's stubborn and imposing, yet hides a soft
side! The god of the skies, Nadraga!!

313028.「我は 神なり。ゆえに 敗北することなど\n ありえん。我が手にするのは ただ:
I am a god. Therefore, my defeat is out of the
question. What I shall grasp is a single
thing: victory, and victory alone.

313029.「……傲慢だと 思うか？\n だが 我は 何も心配していないぞ。\n 神々の長兄:
Do you believe me to be arrogant...? I am not
concerned in the slightest what you think. As
the eldest of gods, all races revere me...

313030.「愛されているに 決まっている。: It is obvious that you all love me.

313031.「ここからは 激しい予選を勝ち抜いた\n 強豪が 続々 登場～！\n まずは！:
From here on out, our strong competitors who
won the qualifying rounds will come out one
after the other! First up, our top qualifier!

313032.「俺のそばへ来いって 何度でも 言われたいっ！\n いやいや 言われなくても\n:
I want to be told "By my side!" over and over
again! Forget that! I'll come running even if
you tell me not to!

313033.「ゴーグルと 漆黒の衣を着こなす\n ファッションスタイルは どんなオシャレさん:
His fashion and style with those slick goggles
and that jet-black get-up is unmatched! It's
the Smart Seeker... Raul!

313034.「俺は 約束したんだ。世界中の宝を\n すべて 手に入れると。……だというのに\:
I made a promise... To obtain all the treasure
in the world... And yet, I haven't been able
to reclaim a single seat of Knighthood.

313035.「まだ見ぬ財宝を 手に入れることよりも\n 一度 失ったものを 取り返すことのほ:
I know that reclaiming what was once lost is
much more difficult than obtaining treasures
yet to be found.

313036.「だが いつか あの娘と再会する日のため……\n そして 応援してくれる 皆のた:
But...for the sake of reuniting with her one
day...and for the sake of all of you who
support me, I will reclaim the throne!

313037.「まだまだ 予選突破の猛者は 続くぜぇ～っ！\n お次は みんな お待ちかねっ！:
The fierce competitors who ascended the
qualifiers just continue to impress! Next up,
someone we've been eagerly awaiting!

313038.「以上っ！ ８名のイケメンが\n ナイトの座をかけ コンテストを争っちゃうよ！:
And that's it! These eight handsome men will
compete for the title of Knight!

313039.「栄光の座に かがやくのは 誰か……\n それを決めるのは！\n こ・こ・に・い:
Who will be crowned with glory...? It's up to
you to decide! All! Of! You!

313040.「さ～て どう？ どう？ <pc>。 \n ちょーイケメンが 大集合だけど\n:
Well? Well? There are so many gorgeous men
here, but which one is your honest favorite?

313041.「アストルティア・ナイトに ふさわしいと思う \n イケメンを選んだら\n キミ:
When you've made your choice of who you think
is worthy, make sure to cast your vote!

313042.「投票は 私の カワイイ妹っ！\n 集計係モカの所で 受け付けてるからね！: Give your votes to my cute sister, Mocha!

313043.「ナイトに 投票し終わったら 話があるから\n 会場案内係のファリネのところに:
After you finish voting, be sure to talk to
Farine outside! She's got something to tell
you! Be sure not to forget!!

313144.「いっくよ～！\n みんなっ ステージに 注目するべ～しっ！！:
Here we go!
Ladies and gentlemen, please turn your
attention to the stage!!

315683.「離れ離れになった あの日から\n ずっと あなたの帰りを 待っていたっ！\n:
Ever since that day that they parted ways,
they've been patiently awaiting for you to
come home! The Top Time Traveler... Padre!

315684.「愛する者たちの まごころによって\n 俺は 暗闇の中から この世界に\n 帰っ:
Through the heartfelt wishes of those that I
love most, I was able to return to this world
from an abyss of darkness.

315685.「今 俺が ここにいるのは\n ほかならぬ皆の おかげだ。\n もう二度と つら:
My being here now is thanks to you all. I
won't allow anyone to face hardship ever
again.

315686.「どんなに苦しい 戦いだろうと\n 俺は 勝利を つかみ\n アストルティア・ナ:
No matter how tough the battle, I will seize
victory, and become Astoltia Knight!

315687.「ご無事で 何よりです。\n 主……あなたのご帰還を\n 空の彼方から 待ち望ん:
I'm relieved to see you safe, milord...
I've been eagerly awaiting your return from
the skies above!

315688.「パドレを 主と呼ぶ男！\n もう みんな お気づきかね！？\n 予選上位入賞者:
It's the man who calls Padre his lord!
Come on, haven't you noticed yet?! Next
up is none other than our top qualifier!

315689.「天に召されても その忠誠心は健在！\n 主君との絆は 誰にも引き裂けないっ！\:
His loyalty remains unfazed, even from the
skies above! He shares an unbreakable bond
with his lord! The Sincere Swordsman... Faras!

315690.「我が主は どんな苦境に 立たされようと\n 大切な人たちのことを 第一に考える:
No matter the challenges that my lord faces,
he always puts those most important to him
first. He is truly an incredible man...

315691.「私の中の アストルティア・ナイトは\n 主 ただひとり！\n 正直に言えば 主:
The Astoltia Knight inside of me has only a
single master! To be quite honest, I feel like
I should cast my vote for him.

315692.「しかし こうして 選ばれたからには\n 負けるわけにはいきませんな！ ナイトの:
However, now that I've been chosen...there's
no way I'm going to lose! I will claim the
Knight's seat for myself!

315693.「ラストは ひさしぶりの登場だぁっ！\n 苦節５年！ 堂々２位で 念願の\n 予:
Last but not least, this guy is making a
comeback after five long years! This guy
came in a respectable second place!

315694.「燃えるような 赤い肌に アツい魂！\n 俺様系オラオラ★プリンス～っ\n ギル:
With burning red skin and a fiery soul to
match! The self-proclaimed Prince of
Pridefulness... Prince Gilgaran!

315695.「待たせたな。\n ようやく この場所へ 戻ってきたぞ。:
Sorry to keep you all waiting. I was finally
able to come back.

315696.「これまで 惜しくも出場できず\n 何度 ここへ 乱入しようと思ったことか……。:
I wasn't able to participate up until now, and
many times just thought of bursting in here...
Grie stopped me every single time.

315697.「ふたたび 戻ってきたからには\n ナイトの座は 必ず いただく！\n お前たち:
And now that I'm back again, the Knight's
seat will be mine! You'd all better follow
behind me!
